Uses of Class
Chat.ChatCommand

Uses of ChatCommand in Chat
 

Subclasses of ChatCommand in Chat
 class AddMessageCommand
          Description of AddMessageCommand: This is where one can send messages using the ChatCommand to send messages through the ChatServer.
 class DisconnectChatCommand
          Description of DisconnectChatCommand: This class is responsible for taking the actions of the user to disconnect the chat server when prompted to do so.
 class UpdateActiveTextCommand
          Description of UpdateActiveTextCommand: The UpdateActiveTextCommand updates the text that a user is entering from their given server to display on everyones computer at the same time.
 class UpdateChatCommand
          Description of UpdateChatCommand: This class updates the text that the user is entering as a message to all the users on the document editor.
 class UserTextStatusCommand
          Description of UserTextStatusCommand: This class shows when the user may be typing right above the message bar.
